name: trading-intelligence-patterns
title: Trading Intelligence Patterns
description: Advanced patterns for sentiment, fundamental, and technical analysis in trading systems

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Patterns must include specific indicators and statistical justifications
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: User determines which patterns are appropriate for their risk profile
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Analysis logic must be explainable and traceable
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Risk management is central to all trading patterns
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Uniform structure for all trading intelligence categories

hierarchical_clustering.description: Pattern detection using CNN-TA image representation and hierarchical clustering (Jansen)
hierarchical_clustering.use_when: Identifying recurring market structures across multiple assets
workflow: Convert time series to 2D image format
Cluster patterns based on prediction performance

factor_models.description: Fama-French Multi-Factor models for risk/return analysis
factor_models.use_when: Explaining portfolio returns beyond market beta
best_practices: Account for sector bias in factor exposures
Lag features to prevent look-ahead bias

anti_patterns.name: Data Mining Bias
anti_patterns.problem: Searching for any pattern that worked in the past without economic logic
anti_patterns.fix: Mandatory Hypothesis Formation step in strategy pipeline

anti_patterns.name: Look-Ahead Bias
anti_patterns.problem: Using data in the backtest that would not have been available at the time of the trade
anti_patterns.fix: Lag all features by at least one period during calculation
